name: Crazy Otto's Crazy Castle
description:
Crazy Otto's Crazy Castle is our entry for #GBJam 5.

You start near the front door of a haunted castle. The front door is locked. You have to find the key and escape.

You can play with friends over a network or the internet. One player will need to start a multiplayer game, and then tell everybody else what their IP address is so they can join.

At some point this game is going to be polished up and made into an add-on for Crazy Otto.

In the meantime, hope you enjoy the game and sorry about all the bugs! :)
